comment: A wind driven generating unit, connected to the grid by means of a rotating machine.  May be used to represent a single turbine or an aggregation.
description: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: windGenUnitType
contents.comment: The kind of wind generating unit.

contents.name: WindPowerPlant
contents.comment: A wind power plant may have wind generating units.
